revised_title: Anatomy and Vascular System of Sphenodon
tldr: The author provides a detailed description of the intracranial blood vessels of the Sphenodon, a reptile, using a special method of investigation. The study reveals similarities and differences in the vascular system compared to other reptiles, such as Lacertilia and Chelonia. The research contributes to the understanding of the anatomy and physiology of Sphenodon and its evolutionary relationships with other reptiles.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vertebrate anatomy
